head.title: no-extra-semicolons
head.description: no-extra-semicolons Disallow extra semicolons. Options true The following patterns are considered warnings: The following patterns are…

body:
#no-extra-semicolons

Disallow extra semicolons.

a { color: pink;; }
/**             ↑
 *  This semicolons */

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

@import "x.css";;
@import "x.css";
;
.foo {
  color: pink;;
}
.foo {
  ;color: pink;
}
.foo {
  color: pink;
  ;
}
.foo {
  color: red;
}
;
.bar {
  color: white;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

@import "x.css";
.foo {
  color: pink;
}
